snippet: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Philadelphia plans to close about a quarter of its high schools and close or combine nearly 30 percent of its elementary schools.
abstract: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Philadelphia plans to close about a quarter of its high schools and close or combine nearly 30 percent of its elementary schools due to rising costs and low enrollment.
lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Philadelphia plans to close about a quarter of its high schools and close or combine nearly 30 percent of its elementary schools.
